name: CEFR A1 入门
description: 欧洲语言共同参考框架 A1 级别词汇 (1063词)

examples.sentence: The bird is above the tree.

examples.translation_cn: 你最喜欢的活动是什么？

examples.sentence: I want to do it again.
I saw him a week ago.
I am happy because of you.
I am tired because I worked.
I want to become a doctor.
My bed is in the bedroom.
The cat is behind the box.
The cat is below the table.
The book is beside the lamp.
The cat is between the boxes.
I want to go, but I am busy.
The clock is on the wall.

examples.translation_cn: 这是一场很棒的音乐会。

examples.sentence: The book is in the corner.

examples.translation_cn: 我有一个堂/表兄弟姐妹。

examples.sentence: Can I pay with a credit card?
examples.translation_cn: 我可以用信用卡支付吗？

examples.sentence: December is the last month of the year.
examples.translation_cn: 十二月是一年的最后一个月。
你能描述一下这张照片吗？

examples.sentence: The book is on the desk.
We eat in the dining room.

examples.translation_cn: 八十是一个很大的数字。

examples.sentence: You can choose either apple or orange.
examples.translation_cn: 你可以选择苹果或者橙子。
我给你发了一封电子邮件。

examples.sentence: Can you give me an example?

examples.translation_cn: 蓝色是我最喜欢的颜色。

examples.sentence: I live on the first floor.
The car is in the front.
I am glad to see you.
The ball is on the ground.
I love you with all my heart.
If it rains, I will stay home.
examples.translation_cn: 如果下雨，我会待在家里。

examples.sentence: If you want, you can come.
The book is in the bag.
Put the book into the bag.
I am in the living room.
There are a lot of people.
I go to school on Monday.
I eat breakfast in the morning.

examples.translation_cn: 她是一位优秀的音乐家。

examples.sentence: I wear a necklace on my neck.
examples.translation_cn: 我脖子上戴着一条项链。
九十是一个很大的数字。

examples.sentence: This is a book of mine.
It is a cup of tea.

examples.translation_cn: 我喜欢奥林匹克运动会。
奥林匹克运动会很有趣。

examples.sentence: The book is on the table.
She is the owner of the dog.
I have a pair of shoes.
This is a piece of cake.
It's a pleasure to meet you.
I have a key in my pocket.
examples.translation_cn: 我的口袋里有一把钥匙。

examples.sentence: I like to swim in the pool.
examples.translation_cn: 我喜欢在游泳池里游泳。
她在网上发了一个帖子。

examples.sentence: I have a poster on my wall.
This is a present for you.
I put the book on the table.
It is a quarter past one.
I want a quarter of the cake.
examples.translation_cn: 我想要四分之一的蛋糕。

examples.sentence: I need to review my notes.
The ribbon is on the box.

examples.translation_cn: 他扮演一个重要的角色。

examples.sentence: The sailor works on a ship.
The book is on the shelf.

examples.translation_cn: 六十是一个很大的数字。

examples.sentence: The flower has a nice smell.
I am tired, so I sleep.

examples.translation_cn: 数学是我最喜欢的科目。

examples.sentence: I go to the swimming pool.
The train goes through the tunnel.
I live in a small town.
The cat is under the table.
The book is under the chair.

examples.translation_cn: 我给重要的词划下划线。

examples.sentence: I will wait until you come.
The cat is up the tree.
She usually goes to school by bus.
examples.translation_cn: 她通常坐公共汽车去学校。

examples.sentence: We go on vacation in summer.
The flowers are in the vase.
The picture is on the wall.
